sentence.Network_en: "What about a liqueur with your coffee?" suggested the waitress.
sentence.Network_cn: “咖啡里加杯甜酒怎么样？”女服务员建议。

sentence.Network_en: Sometimes they tell me I'm just a glorified waitress.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们有时候对我说我只是个女招待，只不过称呼好听一些罢了。

sentence.Network_en: My waitress whipped the plate away and put down my bill.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的服务员麻利地撤走盘子并搁下我的账单。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... waiter （餐厅）服务员 waitress （餐厅）女服务员 rent 租金.
关于职业的英语单词_百度文库 ... waiter: 侍者(服务生) waitress: 女侍者(服务生) welder: 焊接工.
职称英语等级考试A - 原版英语_馆档网 ... waiter (男)待者，(男)服务员 waitress (女)待者，(女)服务员 walk 步行，散步.
大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... exhaust vt. 使筋疲力尽 waitress n. 女服务生 awry a. 歪；斜.

list.abs: Is your mother a waitress ?, 你的妈妈是一位服务员吗?
There was a waitress there ., 那里还有一位女招待.
He says he will ask the blonde waitress an integral and the first laughingly agrees ., 他说他会问那个金发女服务员一道积分题 , 第一位笑着答应了.
don't be allured into bars by the pretty waitresses .不要被漂亮的女招待引诱到酒吧去。
He fancied a young waitress in the restaurant ., 他对那个餐馆中的一个年轻女服务员有好感.

entry.def: A waitress is a woman who works in a restaurant, serving people with food and drink.
A woman who waitresses works in a restaurant serving food and drink.

example.ex: She had been working in a pub, cooking and waitressing.
example.tran: 她之前在酒吧工作，负责烹饪和招待。

auth_sentence.content: The manager and another waitress hovered close to us.
auth_sentence.res_content: The manager and another waitress hovered close to us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The manager and another waitress hovered close to us.

auth_sentence.content: The waitress knew them and stopped at their booth.
auth_sentence.res_content: The waitress knew them and stopped at their booth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The waitress knew them and stopped at their booth.

auth_sentence.content: The waitress wanted tickets to a Michael Jackson concert.
auth_sentence.res_content: The waitress wanted tickets to a Michael Jackson concert.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The waitress wanted tickets to a Michael Jackson concert.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"物品"; 2. 表名词,"女性"

stems_affixes.word_buile: butt树桩+ress物品→n.扶墙,拱壁 v.支持
fort堡垒+ress通常表示女性,这里表示凹进去→n.堡垒,要塞
wait等候+ress女性→n.女侍者,女服务员
butt树桩+ress物品→n.扶墙,拱壁 v.支持

Sentence.sentence: Within a year, I had to hire another cook and four waitresses.
He hired a cook and two local waitresses

sentences.en: A waitress arrived with the wine they had ordered.
sentences.cn: 一名女招待送来了他们点的葡萄酒。

sentences.en: A waitress came in, carrying tea on a tray.
sentences.cn: 一名女侍者走进来，手端放着茶的托盘。

sentences.en: He casually waved over the waitress and settled the bill.
sentences.cn: 他漫不经心地向侍者挥手结账。
